title: Hello, World!
subtitle: When you have nothing to say...
body: The tradition of using 'Hello, World!' dates back to the early days of computer programming. The phrase was first used in the book 'The C Programming Language by Brian Kernighan and Dennis Ritchie', which helped popularize it.

title: Why East Asia is more collectivist
subtitle: How our ancestors' farms shaped our thinking
body: Many people must work together to grow rice and maintain the infrastructure. A family can support itself growing wheat, while rice requires the whole village.
